value:
There's a lot to learn, even outside
the classroom. I'll need to see it all if
I'm going to become a proper knight!

Sylvain said that a knight is loved by
their people. So, I'm going to make
sure this festival is fun for everyone!

I wish my little brother and sister
could come to this festival too. I'm
sure they'd love it!

Aren't you going to get dressed up in
spring festival garb, Summoner? I'm
sure you'd look better in it than me!

The Kingdom of Askr sure is a nice
place. I really get the sense that
everyone is enjoying the festival!

I'm Ashe Ubert! I've been entrusted
with delivering a spring festival gift
from $Nf!

No matter the challenge, I'll hop right
over itâ€”quick like a bunny!

I won't let anything get in the way
of everyone enjoying the festival
to its fullest!

The spring sun feels so nice. It makes
me want to drift off to sleep...
No, I need to focus!

It is a knight's duty to be steadfast!
I will make sure this spring festival
is a success!

Oh, is this where we're celebrating
the spring festival? Let me know
how I can help make things fun!

Summoner, the spring festival is a
smashing success! Everywhere you
look, people are all smiles!$k$pA long time ago, I tried to get by on
the wrong path. I did it to feed my
brother and sister, but still...$k$pLord Lonato saved me. I want to
become a proper knight, not so I can
atone, but so I can save others too.$k$pA knight's duty is to make sure the
people can keep smiling. This festival
has only strengthened my resolve!$k$pI still have a lot to learn, but I will
never, ever give up on my dream.$k$pWith the memory of this spring
festival engraved on my heart, I will
continue on my path to knighthood.$k$pStraight ahead, without faltering!
Spring has sprung!
This'll be a breeze!
Fear the ears!
Hopping to it!
Got carried away...
Thank you for inviting me to such a fun festival!
Ah. What is it? Is something wrong?

I always make sure to get plenty of rest.
Knights need to keep their energy up.
Getting all dressed up like this... I dunno.
It's nice to be called cute, I guess. Even if I'd rather be dashing.
I found some adorable bunny-shaped treats. I wish I could bring them home to my brother and sister.
It's been a real pleasure spending the spring with you.
Yes!
Don't nod off, now.
I'll spring into action!
